name: Sun Reflector
description:
SunReflector:

24 Levels in 3 stages + play and create custom Levels

How to play:

You try to get the sunlight to the earth, by placing different objects.

> Tutorial in game.  (can be disabled in main menu)

Keybinds:
  • Rotate: R
  • Destroy: RMB
  • Quit to main menu: esc / Q

only in level editor:

  • lock: X
Level Editor:
  • Drag objects in like normal. 
  • You can also move and rotate the start and  goal. 
  • Press x on an object to lock it. Every not locked object will be given the player to place.
  • You can copy the code of the level after finishing it.
